amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-7 to make technical edits and to add a conforming clarification for the authorities of the Office of the Special Counsel to ensure that the Act's monetary civil penalties under new section 7382(c)(2) can be fully enforced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Comer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
